title: IAA Tonight | Matt Rhule Fired AND Ron Rivera Calls Out His QB
description: The Carolina Panthers have parted ways with head coach Matt Rhule, the team announced Monday. The move comes a day after a 37-15 loss to the San Francisco 49ers which left the Panthers with a 1-4 record on the season. This firing led to our discussion on college coaches transitioning to the NFL, and why more times than not they ultimately fail. Plus, did Washington Commanders head coach Ron Rivera call out QB Carson Wentz?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Adam Pacman Jones, Omar KElly)
